hero.title: Kulembera Enkyukakyuka ey'Obutonde ku Nnamuziga Bbiri
hero.subtitle: Yingira mu mukutu gw'entambula eya bulijjo ogukula ennyo mu Afrika. Tendekebwa, weebwe ekiwandiiko, otandike okufuna - kubanga buli lugendo lusaana.

about.title: Okuzimba Ebiseera eby'Obutonde bya Afrika
about.description: SMP Green Rides Africa kye kkampuni y'enkola ey'okufuna baddereeva eyeewaddeyo okuzimba abakolera abakuza enkyukakyuka y'entambula eya bulijjo mu Afrika. Tukwataganya abantu abalina essanyu n'amakisa g'entambula enterevu.

mission.title: Ekigendererwa Kyaffe
mission.description: Tuzimba abakolera abasindiikirira Afrika okukulaakulana - mu ngeri enterevu.

vision.title: Okwolesebwa Kwaffe
vision.description: Afrika eya bulijjo ennyo, esindiikirirwa baddereeva abalina amaanyi.

values.title: Emize Gyaffe
values.description: Obwesimbu, obunterevu, n'okukola obulungi bisindiikirira buli kye tukola. Tukkiriza mu kutondawo enkyukakyuka eyinza okumala ebbanga ng'okozesa obukwatanyizi obw'omutindo.

reach.title: Okutuuka Kwaffe
reach.description: Ng'okola mu bibuga ebinene eby'Afrika, tuzimba omukutu omunene ennyo ku kizikiza gw'abakugu b'entambula eya bulijjo.

partnerships.title: Obukwatanyizi obw'Enkola
partnerships.description: Oli omukulembeze w'emmotoka oba kkampuni ya e-mobility enoonya baddereeva abalina obukugu? Tuwa abakugu abatendekeddwa, abaseeseddwa abeetegefu okwegatta ne ttiimu yo.

services.title: By'okuddamu Baddereeva Okuva Entandikwa Okutuuka Enkomerero
services.subtitle: Okuva ku kupeesa okutuuka ku kutumibwa, tukwata buli ddaala ly'okuzimba abakolera bo ab'entambula.

acquisition.title: Okufuna Baddereeva
acquisition.description: Okunoonya n'okusesema baddereeva abalina obukugu okuva mu nsangwa ez'enjawulo mu Afrika yonna.

certification.title: Pulogulaamu z'Ebiwandiiko
certification.description: Okutendeka okukkirizibwa mu mulimu okukwata ku bwereere, obuweereza bw'abakasi, n'okuvuga emmotoka za simu.

partnerships.title: Obukwatanyizi bw'Emmotoka
partnerships.description: Enkwatagana butereevu ne kkampuni ez'entambula ezinene ezinoonya abakugu abatendekeddwa.

sustainability.title: Okwefumiitiriza ku Bunterevu
sustainability.description: Okuzimba abakolera abeewaddeyo eri by'okuddamu by'entambula eza simu n'ez'ensi.

logistics.title: Okutendeka kw'Entwala
logistics.description: Pulogulaamu ez'enjawulo ez'okutwala okw'ebbanga ddene n'emirimu gy'okugula ku yintaneeti.

quality.title: Omutindo gw'Okukola
quality.description: Okusesema okw'amaanyi okukakasa nti baddereeva bakituukiriza omutindo ogusinga ennyo ogw'obukugu.

cta.question: Wetegese okwongera emmotoka zo ne baddereeva abalina obukugu?

contact.title: Ka Tutandike Okwogerako
contact.subtitle: Olina ebibuuzo ku buweereza bwaffe oba oyagala okufuuka omukwatanyizi? Twandyagadde okuwulira okuva gy'oli.

success.title: Obubaka Butumiddwa!
success.description: Weebale okukwatagana naffe. Tujja kukuziramu mu ssaawa 24.

register.title: Tandika akawunti
register.subtitle: Yingira mu ttiimu ya SMP okuddukanya baddereeva

errors.passwordLength: Akabonero kirina okuba ennukuta 8 oba okusinga

success.title: Kebera email yo
success.hint: Tofunye email? Kebera folda ya spam oba gezaako nate

dashboard.subtitle: Bino bye bituuka mu nkola yo ey'abaddereeva leero.

pipeline.subtitle: Baddereeva ku ddaala lyonna
pipeline.dragDrop: Sika era osiibule baddereeva wakati w'amadaala okukyusa embeera zaabwe

recent.title: Baddereeva Abapya
recent.subtitle: Ebigattiddwa emabegawo mu nkola
recent.emptyDescription: Tandika n'okugattako ddereeva wo owasooka mu nkola

empty.noDrivers: Tewali baddereeva bazuddwa. Gattako ddereeva wo owasooka okutandika.

new.title: Ggatako Ddereeva Omupya
new.subtitle: Yingiza ebikwata ku ddereeva okubagattako mu nkola

danger.confirmDelete: Oli mukakafu oyagala okusazaamu akawunti yo? Kino tekisobola kuddizibwamu.

errors.loadDrivers: Kusazeewo okutereeza baddereeva. Nsaba okebere enkwatagana yo ne Supabase.
errors.loadPipeline: Kusazeewo okutereeza enkola. Nsaba okebere enkwatagana yo ne Supabase.

metadata.title: SMP Green Rides Africa
metadata.description: Akakiiko k'okufuna baddereeva ku ntambula enterevu mu Afrika. Yingira mu nkyukakyuka eya bulijjo ku nnamuziga bbiri.
metadata.ogTitle: SMP Green Rides Africa - Akakiiko k'Okufuna Baddereeva
metadata.ogDescription: Yingira mu mukutu gw'entambula eya bulijjo ogukula ennyo mu Afrika. Tendekebwa, funa ekiwandiiko, era otandike okufuna ng'entambula enterevu.
metadata.twitterDescription: Akakiiko k'okufuna baddereeva ku ntambula enterevu mu Afrika
